data.title: Prince Mikasa
data.text:
AKA Takahito

Born: 15-Dec-1915

Birthplace: Tokyo, Japan

Died: 27-Oct-2016

Location of death: Tokyo, Japan

Cause of death: Pneumonia

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: Asian

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Royalty

Nationality: Japan

Executive summary: Son of Emperor Taisho

Military service: Japanese Imperial Army (cavalry, WWII)

Eldest member of the Japanese royal family as of 2006.

Father: Emperor Taisho

Mother: Empress Teimei

Brother: Emperor Hirohito

Brother: Prince Chichibu

Brother: Prince Takamatsu

Wife: Takagi Yoriko (m. 22-Oct-1941, until his death, two daughters, three sons)

Daughter: Konoe Yasuko (b. 26-Apr-1944)

Son: Prince Tomohito of Mikasa (b. 5-Jan-1946)

Son: Prince Katsura (b. 11-Feb-1948)

Daughter: Sen Masako (b. 23-Oct-1951)

Son: Prince Takamado (b. 29-Dec-1954, d. 21-Nov-2002)

University: Imperial Military Academy (1932-36)

Professor: Tokyo University

New!
